dict.acceptation: 分类，类别；品质，本性；方法；一群；

sent.orig: A sort of horror, a sort of protest against his withdrawing into that horrid black hole.
sent.trans: 一种恐惧，一种抗议撤销这一可怕的黑洞。

sent.orig: On the PivotTable or PivotChart toolbar, click Sort Ascending or Sort Descending.
sent.trans: 在“数据透视表”或“数据透视图”工具栏上，单击“升序排序”或“降序排序”。

sent.orig: We were a sort of royalty, almost infallible, with a sort of magic around us.
sent.trans: 我们象皇亲国戚一样，几乎是无可指摘的，在我们周围有一种魔力。

sent.orig: Home is happiness and sweetness. That sort of thingthat sort of thing.
sent.trans: 家庭意味着幸福、温馨，就是这个样子。

sent.orig: The sort > element is used to sort output.
sent.trans: 元素用于对结果进行排序。
